resources.string: Route Input screen.

Please enter a walking route destination. Double tap to here your currently entered destination. Swipe up to enter a new route destination. Swipe down to hear about current location and save as future route. Swipe left to search for the currently entered route. Swipe right to explore previously entered routes. Press and hold anywhere on the screen to hear these instructions again.
Route Arkive Screen.

Touch screen and drag up and down to hear choices for route destinations. Release and double tap to select choice. Swipe left to return without selecting any choice. Press and hold anywhere on the screen to hear these instructions again.
Save current location screen.
Double tap the screen to save your current location as a potential destination for later use. Press and hold anywhere on the screen to hear these instructions again.
Multiple possible matches were found for the destination you entered.

Touch screen and drag up and down to hear suggestions for route destinations. Release and double tap to select choice. Swipe right to return without selecting any choice. Press and hold anywhere on the screen to hear these instructions again.
Multiple possible addresses were found for your current location.

Touch screen and drag up and down to hear suggestions for your location\'s address. Release and double tap to select choice. Swipe right to return without selecting any choice. Press and hold anywhere on the screen to hear these instructions again.
Route directions list.

Touch screen and drag up and down to the various steps in the route to your destination. If your route has more steps than fit on the screen, then you can double tap the bottom item to hear more steps. Double tap the return item or swipe right to return to the route orienting screen. Press and hold anywhere on the screen to hear these instructions again.
Route Orienter screen.

Double tap screen to turn orienting vibration on. Double tap again to turn it off. Swipe up to recompute current route. Swipe down to hear about current location and save as future route. Swipe left to go to a list of directions for the current route. Swipe right to return to route input screen. Press and hold anywhere on the screen to hear these instructions again.
